CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - RESOLUTIONS
This table gives the location within this Code of those resolutions adopted since the 1979 Code, which are included herein. Resolutions adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1979 Code. Resolutions not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
